questionStem.text: [{"typeEnum":"text","content":"如果过一个多边形的一个顶点的对角线有","style":{},"source":null},{"typeEnum":"latex","content":"https://jyimgs.gsxcdn.com/upload/image/question/format/20191105/20191105001407623abdbca853e44482481ce79e1242c9daf505878.png","style":{"src":"https://jyimgs.gsxcdn.com/upload/image/question/format/20191105/20191105001407623abdbca853e44482481ce79e1242c9daf505878.png","width":"8","height":"15"},"source":"$6$"},{"typeEnum":"text","content":"条，则该多边形是","style":{},"source":null},{"typeEnum":"latex","content":"https://jyimgs.gsxcdn.com/upload/image/question/format/20191105/20191105001409030d4823b6e867547468dda1ce1c60c8201360324.png","style":{"src":"https://jyimgs.gsxcdn.com/upload/image/question/format/20191105/20191105001409030d4823b6e867547468dda1ce1c60c8201360324.png","width":"29","height":"20"},"source":"\\((\\quad)\\)"},{"typeEnum":"text","content":"．","style":{},"source":null}]
